title: Mourning a return to old routines? How to stay positive an ease anxiety as states reopen
body: Each week we get closer to a return to normal as restrictions lift, states reopen and more people get vaccinated. But even though this past year has been full of hardships, it’s also given a lot of people the opportunity to slow down and take stock of what really matters. Many people are actually mourning a return to old routines, so family therapist  discussed how hold onto the positive as we move forward.
